title: Himi 370
lyrics:
M. ‘e 8 laui 6 (vaheua)
1.
‘E Sīsū, ko e moana
Ho’ ‘ofa ki he angahal
a
.
Ko hai ‘e tukutuku ai?
Taau ke ‘ofa atu ē
He mea mo’ui fulipē,
He loto mo e ‘atamai.
2.
‘Oku ke ‘afio’i ma’u
‘I ho taloni atu fau;
He pule tāfataha ia.
Ka ‘oku ke hā’ele mai
Ke taki au ki Hēvani,
Ke u nofo ‘i he monū’ia.
3.
Ka houhau ho fofonga ia,
Ko Langi ‘oku ilifia;
Ngaūe ‘a hono ngaahi pou.
Pea ‘e fatu nai ‘e hai,
Ho’ ʻofa afe ‘oku fai,
Ho’ ‘ofa ki he noa ko au?
4.
Toulekeleka ange fau!
‘Oku tutu’
u
pē mo pūlou
‘E he kau ‘āngelo kotoa.
Fēfē ho’ tokanga’i au?
A e kelemutu, lou’akau,
He ‘ata mo’e mea noa?
5.
Fonu lelei! Ko Koe ia
He Fauniteni fiefia;
Kakato pē ‘a e me’a ‘a’au
Pea fēfē ha’o tokanga’i
Ke ma’u ‘a hoku ‘atamai
Ta’e’aonga ange fau?
6.
‘Oku punou ‘a Heli ia,
‘O mātu’aki ilifia
Ki he ‘Otua Māfimafi.
Pea ko ‘eni ia koā
‘Oku ne pani ta’ata’a?
Ne mate ke u mo’ui ai?
7.
‘E Sīsū, ko e moana
Ho ‘ofa ki he tō ki mal
a
Ko hai ‘e lava ke vakil
i
?
Ko Koe pe te u ‘ofa ai,
He loto mo e ‘atamai,
‘I taimi mo ‘itāniti. *
